sources.title: Glamour | Full Movie | Mystery Thriller | Charles Venn
sources.description:
Glamour - A down-and-out detective attempts to solve a disturbing case involving the massacre of models. Can he find the killer before it's too late?
GLAMOUR stars Adrian Bouchet (The Last Kingdom) and Charles Venn (The Dark Knight, The Bourne Ultimatum) and is a London based thriller/noir in which a fired detective investigates a murder within the modelling and fashion world.
2020.  Stars: Adrian Bouchet, Chabris Napier-Lawrence, Charles Venn, Sarah Alexandra Marks

metadata.Plot: A successful businessman is accused of rape and murder and his ex law school professor and a succesful lawyer is hired to release him of all charges.
metadata.Actors: Sasmit Bagchi, Sabyasachi Chakrabarty, Parambrata Chattopadhyay
